domain

Interface IDiscount<D extends DatabaseItem>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgeDiscount, CityDiscount

    public interface IDiscount<D extends DatabaseItem>
    This Interface represents every Discount. It is parameterized by the DatabaseItem subject to the Discount.
    Author:
    Gaston Lemaire

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float apply(float p)
      This method applies a Discount on the specified price by simply multiplying it.
      boolean isApplicable(D d)
      This method checks if a Discount is applicable to a DatabaseItem.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        float apply(float p)
        This method applies a Discount on the specified price by simply multiplying it.
        Parameters:
        p - The price you want to apply a Discount on.
        Returns:
        The price multiplied by the Discount.

      • isApplicable

        boolean isApplicable(D d)
        This method checks if a Discount is applicable to a DatabaseItem.
        Parameters:
        d - The DatabaseItem.
        Returns:
        True if the Discount is applicable else False.
